allielapidus: I love this and love you sharing about it. I sort of organically found myself pleasure-centering a few years ago and basically realized that anything that feels good and gets you into the body is life-promoting and totally intersects with the creative/sexual energy flow. Savoring food (slowly!), being intentional with scent, really positive feeling exercise are critical for a high-quality life experience. And as you said, they’re definitely *so* connected to the level of enjoyment and satisfaction we experience when engaging in more traditional definitions of sex. The goddess Vesta sort of symbolizes this in astrology- that the body is a temple/house that, when in full and centered SELF devotion to it and it’s aliveness, is the source of our sexual spark and creative fulfillment.
